Html:
Hi,

I'm using GraphSharp library to automatically layout graph visualization application.

I'm not an expert on layout algorithms which is exactly the reason I like this library so much.

I want to expose the layout parameters to the user and in order to do so I need some understanding of what each parameter limits are, what are good default values etc.

Is it possible to publish some documentation about the different layout parameters like BoundedFRLayoutParameters, BoundedFRLayoutParameters, LinLogLayoutParameters. etc.

What are the limit of each property of the parameters classes?

What each property means?

Reference to more documentation about each layout algorithm will also be great.

 

Thank you for the great work,

Ido.
